channel.title: Log4j Exploitability Index
channel.description: Recent content on Log4j Exploitability Index

item.title: Google Cloud Cloud Profiler
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link https://cloud.google.com/log4j2-security-advisory https://cloud.google.com/log4j2-security-advisory Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Product does not use Log4j 2 and is not impacted by the issues identified in CVE-2021-44228 and CVE-2021-45046. CISAGov Last Update: 2021-12-21 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-22 15:55:57 CISAGov Updated communityNotVulnerable.

item.title: Google Cloud Cloud Router
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link https://cloud.google.com/log4j2-security-advisory https://cloud.google.com/log4j2-security-advisory Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Product does not use Log4j 2 and is not impacted by the issues identified in CVE-2021-44228 and CVE-2021-45046. CISAGov Last Update: 2021-12-20 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-22 15:55:57 CISAGov Updated communityNotVulnerable.

item.title: Google Cloud Cloud Run for Anthos
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link https://cloud.google.com/log4j2-security-advisory https://cloud.google.com/log4j2-security-advisory Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Product does not use Log4j 2 and is not impacted by the issues identified in CVE-2021-44228 and CVE-2021-45046. Customers may have introduced a separate logging solution that uses Log4j 2. We strongly encourage customers who manage Cloud Run for Anthos environments to identify components dependent on Log4j 2 and update them to the latest version.

We strongly encourage customers who manage Cloud Shell environments to identify components dependent on Log4j 2 and update them to the latest version.

item.title: Google Cloud Compute Engine
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link https://cloud.google.com/log4j2-security-advisory https://cloud.google.com/log4j2-security-advisory Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Compute Engine does not use Log4j 2 and is not impacted by the issues identified in CVE-2021-44228 and CVE-2021-45046. For those using Google Cloud VMware Engine, we are working with VMware and tracking VMSA-2021-0028.1. We will deploy fixes to Google Cloud VMware Engine as they become available.
